title: Natural expansion of gaothan shall be allowed within 200 m
clause_text: Natural expansion of gaothan shall be allowed within 200 m. from the gaothan boundary and regulations of Residential Zone shall apply. The villages which are not having notified gaothan the residential and other non-agricultural development shall be permitted only along the existing public roads upto a plot depth of 45 m. from the road boundary and regulations of Residential Zone shall apply. For this development premium shall be applicable as per Regulation No.5.1.1. However, such premium shall not be applicable for individual housing or bungalow, not exceeding two units. The provisions in proviso to Regulation No.5.3.1 shall also be applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
